Description: Lip sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) pottery bowl; interior glazed brown with reserved band below lip; exterior: cream slip, dark brown paint; part of large floral ornament with trace of added red paint; filling ornaments: dots and rosettes; painted line at top of lip with appended dots; inscription cut on interior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.094)
